materials.raw_text: B: 16 g, Tb: 3 g, Tc: 4 g, Y: 1 g

sourcing.instructions: B: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace; Tb: Available from specialty rare earth metal suppliers; Tc: Obtain from a metals company; Y: Buy from a chemical supply store.
